main event: Radar operators at Bolling Field, USAF, spotted an unidentified target on their radar screen, which was observed for 5-10 minutes as it traveled north.
interesting points: The object was detected on radar without a visual sighting., The sighting lasted for 5-10 minutes., The object appeared as a light brighter than the brightest stars., Witness reported the object was large, stationary, and metallic in nature., The report mentions a witness who observed the object while looking up at a 30-degree elevation.
witness description: Witness mentioned the object made no sound and displayed no running lights or exhaust plume.
